main.name: Jaykishan Hirpara
main.description: with 5+ years of experience in designing, developing robust application software with high standards. I am working as a Full stack developer. I have experience to work with MNC as well as startup organization on a wide range of technologies.
main.bio: I have started using JAVA in 2013 when i was doing my internship. During those days as an intern, i actively spent many hours studying the core concepts behind java with hands on practical experience. Since that I am very passionate about new technology, phase complex challenges in work and constantly learning new stuffs out of it.  I enjoy turning complex problems into simple and always sought out opportunities and challenges that are meaningful to me. I worked with US and UK client on different domain like Consumer Goods, Manufacturing and Life science. I get a great experience to work on each phase of the product development life cycle from from start-up organization, where we have design, developed & maintain new product.

resume.skillmessage: Any good developer can program in ANY language just like any good designer can design in ANY medium.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Supertax is a startup, working in Financial domain. We are working on diffrent technology like Java, spring-boot, reactJs, Node with microservice architecture. I have worked on lots of New technology and tools like, ElasticSearch (ELK), Filebeat, Spring cloud sleuth, Flyway, Swagger, Microservice architech etc.

I closely worked with France and Belgium clients on their new design approach as well as fixing technical problems and performance issue to make system robust and fast.

testimonials.text: Jaykishan is very quick to understand the technical as well as business needs of customer and work diligently toward a win-win situation. Keep it up good work Jaykishan

It was a pleasure of working with Jaykishan for 1 year. He is proactive and excellent Java developer. You can give him any task and he will make sure its done with utmost accuracy. I am confident that he will be one of best developer. I enjoyed working with him.
